summary: Saving the character Indra Uchiha for The Uchiha Clan
descriptionHtml:
Required file/mod,in order:

[list]
[*][size=2]Fully Updated Skyrim[/size]
[*][size=2]- All DLC[/size]
[*][size=2]- [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863]SkyUI[/url]
[*][size=2]- [/size][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]Skyrim Script Extender (version 1.7.1. or above)[/url]
[*]- [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168]RaceCompatibility for Skyrim and Dawnguard[/url]

[*][size=2]- [/size][url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=786476615]Naruto Ultimate Overhaul (Steam Workshop)[/url]
[*][size=2]- [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51136]The Uchiha Clan[/url]  and all the requirements of it.[/size]
[*][size=2]- Sasuke Perfect Susanoo [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73138]All Perfect Susanoo's for Uchiha Clan[/url] and all the requirements of it.[/size]
[*][size=2]- [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64018]Become High King of Skyrim V2[/url]
[/list]
Other suggested/required mods for the savegame:
[size=3]
[/size][list]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24565/?]Akatsuki and Naruto overhaul from Naruto Anime[/url] (required)[/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76587/?]Collect Bodies[/url]  (suggested)[/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11454/?]Reanimate spell and corpse collector[/url] (suggested)[/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913]Skyrim Immersive Creatures[/url] (suggested)[/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65013]Immersive Citizens - AI Overhaul[/url] (suggested)[/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46465]Safety Load[/url] (suggested)[/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644]Immersive Weapons[/url] (suggested)[/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733]Immersive Armors[/url] (suggested)[/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56980]VioLens - A Killmove Mod[/url] [/u](required)[/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] (required)[/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526]ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer[/url] (required)[/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12770]Flash Step - Version1_5 - Fixed Eye Glitch[/url] (suggested)[/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68157]Itachi Startup Video and Main Menu Replacer[/url] (suggested)[/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59212]Body Replacement Technique[/url] (suggested) [/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16237]New Mesh Akatsuki robe standalone from Naruto[/url] (required)[/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55943]NARUTO Fire Release Great Fireball Uchiha[/url] (suggested)[/size]
[*][size=2][u]- [/u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249]Hearthfire multiple adoptions - Now with custom home support for kids and spouse[/url] (required)[/size]
[*][size=2]- [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11046]Sasuke Swords and Uchiha Miscellaneous[/url] [u](suggested)[/u]
[/list]


After a long time I managed to complete almost skyrim and its dlc, in this savegame we get almost 99% of completed missions, all the perks and abilities have been unlocked as well as spells and shoots.
During the game, all the keys, books, and materials needed for the completed missions have been collected.
The character in question has the following statistics:

[list]
[*][size=2]Class: Uchiha[/size]
[*][size=2]Name: Indra[/size]
[*][size=2]Level: 136[/size]
[*][size=2]Magicka: 1000000[/size]
[*][size=2]Health: 1000000[/size]
[*][size=2]Stamina: 1000000[/size]
[/list]
Every aspect of The Uchiha Clan has been added, even though I chose the path of Sasuke, there are also spells that do not compete like:

[list]
[*][size=2]The Mokuton jutsu (Madara)[/size]
[*][size=2]Rinnegan Jutsu (Nagato,Madara,Sasuke)[/size]
[*][size=2]Kotoamatsukami 1,2,3 (Shisui)[/size]
[*][size=2]Kamui (all jutsu,Tobi,Kakashi)[/size]
[*][size=2]Sharingan copy spell(Kakashi)[/size]
[*][size=2]Perfect Susanoo etc.[/size].
[/list]
The quest to unlock the rinnegan has been completed and the Rinnegan is active even if the eyes do not show it (I preferred the mangekyou sharingan for a matter of personal taste) but can be changed in the section of the McM. For more detailed information go as well here on the original mod  [url=http:]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51136/?[/url][u] [/u] 
In addition there is the Become High King of Skyrim V2 here, the original mod [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64018/?[/url] which allows it to be the "king of kings" of skyrim, even the quest for this mod has been met.
You find yourself to be the King of Kings ever stronger than ever.
author: bigo891
